snippet.title: The Walking Dead: No Man's Land - First gameplay trailer | Next Games
snippet.description:
The first official mobile game based on the hit AMC TV series features fights for survival in a post-apocalyptic, walker-infested world. Trained by Daryl Dixon, your group will fight the walker menace and save other survivors from Terminus to the Prison.

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land on iOS in October 2015.

http://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.com
http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomansland
http://twitter.com/twdnomansland
http://www.youtube.com/nxtgms
